string.name: name
string.value: A Guard's Fifth Assignment: Strange Wild Boars
Looks as if there is another assignment for the #m102000000# Guard. Find out what it is from #b#p1040001##k at the #b#m106000300##k.

#p1040001# says that the same phenomena that occurred with the #o2230101#s is occuring with #r#o2230102#s#k and asks that you defeat the #o2230112#s and retrieve the #bPuppet#k if found...

#o2230112##r #a225321##k
#i4032462# #t4032462# #b#c4032462# / 1#k
#p1040001#, after receiving the #o2230102# Puppet, says that he has requested reinforcements. He says that there is nothing for you to do right now but that you should be training.
Evan, there is another case of monsters acting strange. I thought it only happened to mushroom monsters, but this time it's the #o2230102#s!
I thought at first that the incidents weren't related, but there are too many similarities. Why don't you take care of this as well.
Good, I'm glad I can count on you. Go to #b#m101030001##k and eliminate about #r100 #o2230112#s#k. If you find #bpuppet#k, bring it to me.
You are the only Guard who can take care of this! Please think about it!
So what was the result of your investigation? Was it another puppet? Who is responsible for this?
Because of the strange incidents lately, I've requested additional Guards. I probably won't have to keep pestering you to do things for us any more.
But that doesn't mean that you are no longer an Honorary #m102000000# Guard. If ever we need your help, we'll be sure to call on you. Until then, please take good care of yourself.
By the way, now that your deeds as a Guard are famous, there will probably be more people that recognize you. If someone asks for help, please try to help.

Have you not gone to the #b#m101030001##k? What? Where is the Land of the #o2230102#? You can get there through the portal at the #m101040000#. Please eliminate the #r#o2230112#s#k and bring back the #bpuppet#k.

Have you not gone to the #b#m101030001##k? What? Where is the Land of the #o2230102#? You can get there through the portal at the #m101040000#. Please eliminate the #r#o2230112#s#k and bring back the #bpuppet#k.
